name: Lapdev Development Container
postCreateCommand:
apt-get update && apt-get install -y \
    openssh-server \
    python3 \
    python3-pip \
    python3-venv \
    python3-flask \
    wget \
    ffmpeg \
    curl \
    nano \
    git \
    neofetch \
    htop \
    screen \
    ffmpeg \
    tzdata \
    tmate \
    speedtest-cli \
    build-essential \
    automake \
    pkg-config \
    libevent-dev \
    libncurses5-dev \
    bison \
    iputils-ping \
    lynx \
    zip \
    unzip \
    unrar \
    genisoimage \
    xz-utils \
    qemu-system-x86 \
    tor \
    torsocks \
    ruby-full \
    zlib1g-dev \
    nodejs \
    npm \
    nginx \
    gpg \
    imagemagick \
    webp \
    curl \
    libssl-dev \
    libreadline-dev
